title: Remedies for breach of collateral contracts not
context: PART 7. REMEDIES ยง490:2-701 Remedies for breach of collateral contracts not impaired. Remedies for breach of any obligation or promise collateral or ancillary to a contract for sale are not impaired by the provisions of this article. [L 1965, c 208, ยง2-701; HRS ยง490:2-701]
